alert.note: Alert for Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:20PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rapides and northeastern Vernon Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clifton, or 11 miles east of Slagle, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hineston, Lacamp, Leander, Sieper, Hutton, Clifton, and Simpson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
